biotools.summary: The VCF Tool Box (TVTB) is a suite of S4 classes and methods for filtering, summarizing and visualizing genetic variation data stored in VCF files. Functionalities are integrated and demonstrated in a programming free Shiny web-application, the Shiny Variant Explorer (tSVE).

bioschemas.name: TVTB
bioschemas.summary: The VCF Tool Box (TVTB) is a suite of S4 classes and methods for filtering, summarizing and visualizing genetic variation data stored in VCF files. Functionalities are integrated and demonstrated in a programming free Shiny web-application, the Shiny Variant Explorer (tSVE).
